PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_BalanceWeightTensionerDesignCriteria
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties of a weight tensioner. The property set can be used by the predefined type TENSIONINGEQUIPMENT of IfcDiscreteAccessory.

PropertyDef.Name: ReferenceDistanceRopeToPulley
PropertyDef.Definition: The reference design criteria for distance from the end of the rope to the fixed pulley.It defines the nominal distance in relation to temperature.

PropertyDef.Name: ReferenceDistanceTensionerToGround
PropertyDef.Definition: The reference design criteria distance from the last tensioner to the ground or the base surface (B value). It defines the nominal distance in relation to temperature.
